parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The number of CPU cores used in the cluster.

parameters.name: InstanceName
parameters.description: The size of used memory in the cluster, in GB.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The total memory size of the cluster, in GB.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The information about the memory resources of the cluster.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The number of CPU cores of each replica node in the cluster.

parameters.name: SearchKey
parameters.description: The memory size of each replica node in the cluster, in GB.
